text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Vasylivskyi Raion | native_name = Василівський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Vasylivskiy rayon prapor.png | flag_alt = Flag of Vasylivskyi Raion | image_shield = Vasylivskiy rayon gerb.png | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Vasylivskyi Raion | image_map = Vasilievskiy rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = 225px | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = | established_title = Established | established_date = 1923 | seat_type = Admin. center | seat = Vasylivka | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Sergiy Grachov | leader_title1 = Chairman | leader_name1 = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 4287.33 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 181271 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +02:00 | timezone1_DST = EEST | utc_offset1_DST = +03:00 | postal_code_type = Postal index | postal_code = 71600—71674 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = +380 6175 | iso_code = | website = http://vasrda.gov.ua | footnotes = }} Vasylivka Raion is one of the five raions (districts) of Zaporizhzhia oblast in southern Ukraine. The administrative center of the district is the town of Vasylivka. Population: Vasylivka Raion is occupied by Russian soldiers (as of 2023). ==Related page== *War in Ukraine == References == Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Zaporizhzhia Oblast
title: Vasylivka Raion
